isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().notice: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner. newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
